**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 593 4.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand --- This intricately carved wooden staff is warm to the touch and thrums with inner energy. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify abjuration magic. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Staff of Abjuration **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 594 4.0 **Price** 230 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_shield_](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
  • **1st** [_alarm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=7), [_feather fall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=111)
  • **2nd** [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [_endure elements_](/Spells.aspx?ID=99), [_resist energy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=256)
Staff of Abjuration (Greater) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 594 4.0 **Price** 900 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** _alarm_, [_glyph of warding_](/Spells.aspx?ID=138)
  • **4th** [_dimensional anchor_](/Spells.aspx?ID=70), _dispel magic_, _resist energy_
Staff of Abjuration (Major) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 594 4.0 **Price** 4,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **5th** [_banishment_](/Spells.aspx?ID=19), _endure elements_
  • **6th** _dispel magic_, [_repulsion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=254)
name: Staff of Abjuration (Major)
